message: Hey, have you seen my headphones? Can't find them anywhere.
I just had the weirdest dream. You were in it, but you were a detective?
Ugh, I overslept again. Third time this week!
What's a good show to binge this weekend? Need recommendations!
Reminder: Your rent is due tomorrow. Don't forget!
Is it just me, or has this week felt insanely long?
You left your water bottle at my place. Want me to bring it to work?
Just tried making sushi for the first time… it did not go well.
Dude, I swear I just saw someone who looked exactly like you.
Thinking of dyeing my hair purple. Bad idea?
My WiFi is down again. This is unacceptable.
Got a new tattoo today! Guess what it is?
Random thought: Do pigeons ever get lost?
I'm officially done with caffeine. This is my farewell message.
Just saw the cutest dog. Almost stole it.
My boss just emailed me at 11 PM. This is unacceptable.
Accidentally said ‘love you’ to my Uber driver. Send help.
Should I get a cat? I feel like I need a cat.
I just tripped over absolutely nothing. Graceful as always.
You won't believe what just happened to me at the grocery store.
